user.title: Connect to Voltalis
user.description: Enter your Voltalis credentials to connect your account.

data_description.username: The email address associated with your Voltalis account.
data_description.password: The password for your Voltalis account.

set_manual_mode.name: Set manual mode
set_manual_mode.description: Set the device to manual mode with a specific preset or temperature.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: The target temperature in Celsius. If set, the device will use temperature mode.

duration_hours.name: Duration (hours)
duration_hours.description: How long to stay in manual mode (in hours). Default is unlimited (until further notice).

disable_manual_mode.name: Disable manual mode
disable_manual_mode.description: Return the device to automatic planning mode.

set_quick_boost.name: Set quick boost
set_quick_boost.description: Quickly boost heating for a short period.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: The target temperature for boost mode. If not specified, uses comfort mode.

duration_hours.name: Duration (hours)
duration_hours.description: How long to boost heating (in hours). Default is 2 hours.
